title: An East-India colation; or a discourse of travels set forth in sundry obseruations, briefe and delightfull; collected by the author in a voyage he made unto the East-Indies, of almost foure yeares continuance. Written by C.F.
author: Farewell, Christopher.
publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. F[awcet],
notes: In two parts; part 2 adds anecdotes of Spain and Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
